answers.answer: I'm in the same boat. I can't believe I have seven more weeks of this. I've never been so uncomfortable. I feel like my hips are going to dislocate and all I want to do is sleep. We will get there!!!

I am due in 4 weeks but I'm stuck in hospital due to preeclampsia it was and perfect pregnancy till 3 weeks ago and they won't induce yet. I'm swollen like a balloon and feel awful I'm literally counting the minute's till I have my Lil boy so even tho I'm due before you lovely ladies I know how frustrating and overwhelming it all is hope the time flies with good memories for you all xx
if it makes you feel better i have a little over 3 weeks left and i feel the same way. i won't be satisfied till it's single digits!

question: While I'm very excited for you mommies that are due the beginning of April I still have 7 weeks to go!! I'm so ready for this baby to come on out. All I want is a 24 hour break from being pregnant lol. He's super active, I get no sleep, I'm losing my appetite and feel like I'm going to roll forward. Hope I'm not the only one who feels like this. At least I get to look forward to my baby shower on Sunday!!!
title: Omg come on!!!
